examples: The clotted cream added a creamy element to the homemade trifle.
I mean, first of all, former senator Jeff Sessions, former attorney general, is no one to be trifled with.
words.defineEn: a sweet dish made with layers of cake, custard, jelly, and cream

examples: The chocolate mousse had a velvety consistency thanks to carrageen.
The mousse had a light and airy texture due to the incorporation of gelatin.
The dessert mousse employed a gelatin-based thickening agent to create a light and airy texture.
The bakery introduced a new layered mousse cake with ganache and raspberry filling.
words.defineEn: a cold dessert with a smooth fluffy texture and with chocolate, fruit, etc.

words.defineVi: một món tráng miệng được làm từ kem, trái cây và bánh trứng đường

examples: Rice pudding is a sweet dessert made with rice, milk, and sugar.
Raw milk is commonly used in certain traditional desserts, like rice pudding and flan.
She transformed plain rice into a delightful rice pudding using manioc starch.
Enhance the flavor of a warm bowl of rice pudding by swirling in a spoonful of kaymak.
words.defineEn: ‌a dessert made by cooking rice in milk and sugar
words.defineVi: ‌một món tráng miệng được làm bằng cách nấu cơm trong sữa và đường

words.defineEn: a cold sweet dish made with slices of bread and soft summer fruits

words.defineEn: a dessert consisting of cream mixed with sugar, fruit juice or wine

examples: Raw milk is commonly used in certain traditional desserts, like rice pudding and flan.

examples: So I was kind of complaining about it on this press junket, you know
Originally a trucking company, it became known for flying gambling junkets to Atlantic City.
It was just, you know, I been done 4,000 junkets with 4,000 of the strangest people who come in for five minutes and ask you the same question and leave.

Yeah, at the press-junket, they had like a room with the game that's been released, and people and would kinda go in and try it and stuff, and my brother, obviously he was bored to tears to be talking about Harry Potter, went in and was trying the game out, and he came back, and I was like, "Oh, did you have a good morning?"
words.defineEn: a sweet, creamy dessert made from milk, sugar, and rennet, a natural enzyme that thickens the mixture and gives it a custard-like texture
